reviewText: Jim Fixx did a nice job with this visual presentation. I have referred to it often over the last ten years. Although my daily milage is far less than "Jim Fixx and friends" the concepts shared in this video apply to all who jog leisurely or run competitively.  A must for any library and a great companion to the "Complete Books of Running"! I am surprised there is no DVD format available.
the first advocate for running and jogging for health reasons! who died of a heart attack while running . ironic?? i think a bit.
